results.name: Table of prime factors of 10^n - 1 (with multiplicity).
comment: The length of the n-th row is A057951(n).
reference: J. Brillhart et al., Factorizations of b^n +- 1. Contemporary Mathematics, Vol. 22, Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, RI, 2nd edition, 1985; and later supplements.
link: Ray Chandler, Rows n = 1..322, flattened (from Kamada link)
